Test Case Change Classification.Acceptance Criteria - Modified Content: Validate repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are applied correctly during creation and reflect the selected option post-creation.

Old Test Case Steps: 1. Ensure user is logged in. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
2. Click the 'New repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
3. Enter repository name. [Test Data- new-repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
4. Enter description. [Test Data- Test repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
5. Select 'Public' as the visibility. [Test Data- Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
6. Check the option to initialize the repository with a README. [Test Data- init_readme: true] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
7. Click the 'Create repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
8. Verify that the new repository is created and the repository page is displayed. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
New Modified Test Case Steps: 1. Ensure user is logged in. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
2. Click the 'New repository' button. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
3. Enter repository name. [Test Data- new-repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
4. Enter description. [Test Data- Test repo] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
5. Select 'Public' as the visibility. [Test Data- Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2] (Verify that the selected visibility is applied during creation and reflected post-creation)
6. Check the option to initialize the repository with a README. [Test Data- init_readme: true] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]

8. Verify that the new repository is created and the repository page is displayed. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2] (Verify that the repository visibility matches the selected option post-creation)

New Modified Expected Results: 1. User is authenticated and on main page.
5. Visibility is set to Public and is correctly reflected after creation.
8. Repository page for 'new-repo' is displayed with correct visibility.
